name: Deploy to Digital Ocean
on:
  push:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Deploy to Digital Ocean
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@master
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.DO_IP }}
          username: ${{ secrets.DO_USER }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DO_PASS }}
          script: |
            # Check if the application directory exists
            if [ ! -d "/the-mind-hacks" ]; then
              echo "Application directory does not exist. Performing initial setup..."
              # Create the directory
              mkdir -p /the-mind-hacks
              # Clone the repository
              git clone https://${{ secrets.GH_TOKEN }}@github.com/armandolio/the-mind-hacks.git /the-mind-hacks
              cd /the-mind-hacks
            else
              echo "Application directory exists. Performing update..."
              cd /the-mind-hacks
              git pull origin main
            fi

            #  Install dependencies
            npm install

            # Check if the PM2 process exists
            if pm2 list | grep -q "the-mind-hacks"; then
              echo "Restarting existing PM2 process..."
              pm2 restart "the-mind-hacks"
            else
              echo "Starting new PM2 process..."
              pm2 start npm --name "the-mind-hacks" -- start
            fi

            echo "Deployment successful!"
